Waco.Vanguard College Preparatory School:
Vanguard College Preparatory School, founded in 1973, is a private, independent, coeducational, college preparatory day school located in Waco, Texas, United States, for students in grades 7-12. Enrollment, as of the 2017-2018 academic year is 218, with 38 on the teaching faculty.
The campus consists of 8.5 acres (3.4 ha) and the school is housed in several buildings.
